function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Temperature and humidity control","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in rooms with centralized outdoor air systems and no floor-centralized exhaust system","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in rooms without openable exterior windows and exhaust ventilation","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Toilet lid being left open during flushing","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ineffective or inappropriate filtration and cleaning methods in hvac systems.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate heat recovery equipment leading to improper air pressure differentials and ventilation.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pressure differentials between zones not maintained as per guidelines, leading to potential cross-contamination of air","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective maintenance of hvac systems leading to poor air quality and potential transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective water system maintenance leading to potential contamination and transmission of waterborne diseases","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of airborne virus transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of air cleaners and filters leading to ineffective control of virus spread","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to maintain pressure differentials leading to inadequate cleanliness control","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorrect operation of heat recovery devices leading to inadequate control of air quality","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear ventilation rate guidelines for minimizing infectious disease risk","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low relative humidity increases the risk of infection","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation increases the risk of transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective air cleaning and filtration","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of sars-cov-2 transmission through air and hvac systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient maintenance of water seals and ventilation pipes","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fire safety and carbon monoxide risk","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of safety hazards in dwellings causing anxiety and injury","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited space to provide systematic coverage of all themes for each type of harm identified","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased risk of physical, sexual, emotional, and verbal violence due to confinement within the home during lockdowns.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Housing precarity and poor neighborhood quality amplifying health risks","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association of eviction threat with increased stress and weakened immune system","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pooling of social harms within homes may lead to increased exposure to contagious diseases and prolonged intensity of harm.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged exposure to social harms in housing","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluid and conflated spaces due to covid-19 lockdowns","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deleterious health consequences of thermal comfort being artificially maintained in privatised air-conditioned home spaces","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulatory failures leading to loss of life, as seen in the grenfell fire incident","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 outbreak on indian construction industry","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of systematic approach for value engineering","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of risk assessment in project management","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lean construction and value engineering may not address the risk of contagious disease transmission in the built environment.","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to lack of attention to facility management and disease control measures","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of value engineering and project management activities may neglect health and safety considerations, leading to increased risk of contagious diseases","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for space in houses to accommodate work from home could lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in sales of residential units and shift towards gated communities may lead to overpopulation in certain areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions in the supply chain for construction materials could lead to delays in project completion and impact the health and safety of workers due to prolonged exposure to construction sites.","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in estimating the full financial impact of the coronavirus crisis.","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monsoon season obstructing work from june 2020.","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of space management in commercial buildings leading to overcrowding and increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited budget and low innovation and technology in facility management services due to the pandemic.","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Off-site construction and modular construction may lead to standardization and lack of customization, increasing the risk of disease spread due to common design elements.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Escalation of cement and sand prices by 5% due to supply chain disruption and less availability","category":"Land Use","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased space utilization and warehouse efficiency due to supply chain disruption and less availability","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unforeseen delays, inflation, and weather impacts affecting project scope, scheduling, and costing","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of project overrun and delay","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Human health risk of global magnitude","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased exposure to contagious diseases for individuals in lower income brackets due to employment in service or delivery sectors","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"}]}
